presentation_title: Aether & Bridle: Capturing the Essence of the Equestrian Spirit

title_slide.title: Aether & Bridle: Capturing the Essence of the Equestrian Spirit

slides.title: Our Vision
slides.body:
• We bottle the untamed elegance of the equestrian lifestyle.
• A luxury fragrance for those who value freedom and heritage.
slides.image_prompt: A minimalist, luxury perfume bottle with a leather-wrapped cap, sitting on a rustic wooden table next to a sprig of lavender. Soft, golden hour light.

slides.title: Market Opportunity
slides.body:
• Niche fragrance segment is growing at 15% CAGR.
• Clear gap for authentic, experience-driven scents.
slides.image_prompt: Infographic chart showing the growth of the niche fragrance market, with elegant equestrian-themed icons and a warm, earthy color palette.

slides.title: Our Debut Collection
slides.body:
• 'Saddle Leather': Rich notes of aged leather and cedarwood.
• 'Hayloft': Sweet, sun-dried hay with a hint of wild clover.
• 'First Gallop': Crisp morning air, green grass, and damp earth.

slides.title: Product Spotlight
slides.body:
• Sustainable packaging with a premium, tactile feel.
• Each bottle is hand-finished with a unique leather accent.
slides.image_prompt: An elegant flat lay of the perfume's packaging: a textured box, a branded card, the bottle itself, and a silk ribbon, all in earthy tones. Macro photography, high detail.

slides.title: Why We Win
slides.body:
• Authentic Scent Profiles: Developed with master perfumers and equestrians.
• Storytelling Brand: We sell an experience, not just a product.
• DTC Model: High margins and direct customer relationships.

slides.title: Competitive Landscape
slides.body:
• Byredo ($180M+ revenue) - Broad, minimalist luxury focus | Our advantage: Deep, authentic niche storytelling.
• Le Labo (Estée Lauder) - City-based, industrial-chic aesthetic | Our advantage: Focus on nature and pastoral heritage.
• Jo Malone (Estée Lauder) - Simple, layerable scents | Our advantage: Complex, evocative single fragrances.

slides.title: Our Customer
slides.body:
• Affluent consumers (30-55) who value craftsmanship.
• Seek unique, non-mainstream luxury goods.
slides.image_prompt: Stylish woman in her late 30s, dressed in sophisticated country attire (tweed, cashmere), walking through a field at sunset. Candid, lifestyle shot.

slides.title: Business Model
slides.body:
• Primary Channel: E-commerce DTC at 75% gross margin.
• Secondary Channel: Partnerships with luxury equestrian boutiques.
slides.image_prompt: A sleek diagram showing the flow from e-commerce website to customer, with icons for online store and boutique partnerships. Clean and modern design.

slides.title: Our Team
slides.body:
• Eleanor Vance, Founder & CEO - Former Brand Director at Ralph Lauren Home.
• Marcus Thorne, Head Perfumer - 20+ years experience at Givaudan.
• Chloe Dubois, Head of Marketing - Scaled DTC brand Brooklinen's social media.
• Ben Carter, Operations Lead - Ex-Supply Chain Manager at The Frye Company.

slides.title: Financial Projections
slides.body:
• Year 1 Revenue Target: $750K
• Projecting $5M in revenue by Year 5.
slides.image_prompt: A clean, elegant bar chart showing revenue growth over 5 years. The bars are colored with the brand's palette of dark brown, beige, and green.

slides.title: Our Ask
slides.body:
Seeking: $500,000 Seed Funding
Use of Funds: Inventory (40%), Marketing (35%), R&D (15%), Operations (10%)
